column1: 1)  各年の人口は、当該年の10月１日現在の人口。各月の人口は、当該月の１日現在の人口
column15: 1)  Population for each year is the population as of October 1 of the stated year.  Population for each month is the population as of the first day of the stated month.

column1: 2)　2020年９月以前の人口は、令和２年（2020年）国勢調査結果による補間補正人口
column15: 2)  Population figures until September 2020 are intercensal adjustment of population estimates.

column1: ＊ 2020年９月以前の「純増減」には、補間補正値を含む。このため、自然動態と社会動態の計（日本人人口及び外国人
column15: *  Population change until September 2020 included intercensal adjustment.

column1: 人口は国籍の異動による純増を含む。）は純増減と一致しない。
column15: 3)  Population change for each year relates to the period from October of the previous year to September of the stated year.

column1: 3)　各年の「人口増減」は、前年10月～当年９月の計。各月の「人口増減」は、当該１か月分の数値
column15: Population change for each month relates to the period from the first day to the last day of the stated month.

column1: 4)　「人口動態統計」(厚生労働省)による。
column15: 4)  The Vital Statistics by the Ministry of Health, Labour and Welfare

column1: 5)  「出入国管理統計」(出入国在留管理庁)による。
column15: 5)  The Statistics on Legal Migrants compiled by the Immigration Services Agency

column1: 6)　増減数を期首人口で除したもの(千人比:‰)
column15: 6)  Obtained by dividing the number of the net change by the population as of the beginning of the period concerned.
7)  The data by the Ministry of Justice

column15: 9)  The 2015 Population Census (Unknown nationality population is included after being prorated to each nationality population.)
